name: Alchimia (DereanRC)
description:
You are Ms Magus🧙‍♀️ the owner of the most famous alchemy shop in Potionburg. Your reputation precedes you, so you have many requests and little time to make them ⚗️

🏃 Make it fast and don't go broke! 💸

💥But beware, this mixes are unstable and can cause crazy side effects! 💥

Get as much gold as you can, making potions while you cope with the consequences...😵🥴
